Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.definitions

Interface ReferenceableDefinition

All Known Subinterfaces:
ActorDefinition, ActorRoleDefinition, CollectionDefinition, DesignModelDefinition, GlossaryTermDefinition, SolutionBlueprintDefinition, SolutionComponentDefinition
All Known Implementing Classes:
EgeriaRoleDefinition, EgeriaSolutionBlueprint, EgeriaSolutionComponent, SolutionBlueprint, SolutionComponent, SolutionRoleDefinition
public interface ReferenceableDefinition
The ReferenceableDefinition is used to describe a predefined element that is a referencable.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    EGERIA_VERSION_IDENTIFIER
    Version of Egeria that this element belongs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getDescription()
    Return the details description of this element.
    String
    getDisplayName()
    Return the short display name that is used in tables and titles.
    default String
    getGUID()
    Return the unique identifier of this element.
    String
    getIdentifier()
    Return the version identifier of the solution blueprint.
    default CollectionDefinition
    getParentCollection()
    Return the optional collection that this element is a part of.
    default String
    getQualifiedName()
    Return the unique name of the element.
    default String
    getTypeName()
    Return the type of this element.
    default String
    getVersionIdentifier()
    Return the version identifier of the solution blueprint.
    default boolean
    isTemplate()
    Return whether this is a template or not.
